reviews.review: the game where either one that come better become the bully

This game has been in a constant state of unbalance for years. They are constantly bugging their own game and adding useless content that further glitches the game in pursuit of the in game blood point currency. Killers are wildly unbalanced against survive with friends teams and even with SWF some killer add-ons allow for ridiculously stupid game play mechanics. After years of playing I am uninstalling I am tired of this developer never getting their act together to make this game fun/functional. Do NOT buy this game it is a waste of time and money. Their "dedicated servers" and cross play integration only made for longer queue times and worse matches with less balance between skill levels.

"Play Something Else!"

-Mathieu Cote (game director of DBD)

If the devs don't even like nor play their games, then how are you supposed to make one?

Excellent Game, can be ruined by other people. This factor really affects how enjoyable the game is. If you get a scummy killer then you wont have much fun, but that is very infrequent. Most players in the community are very respectful.
Make sure you google to uncap frame rate, this significantly improved my experience.
I defo reccomend playing this with friends tho, much more fun and relaxing (especially for a so called 'horror' game)
8/10 Good Game
es todo lo que esta bien

Game isn't new player friendly at all. Almost impossible to get into if your friends have some experience in it. Killers are allowed to camp and target a single player basically making sure you don't play for 15 minutes every game while your friends finish the match.
It has a trash community further, it relased 50 giabye updates reguarly
Skill based match making = crap. No one wanted it, yet they added it.
the game is really fun but it have a litlle amoung of p2w and thats sad

You know, it's crazy. Every week there is a new bug you learn about. High level game play is the same 2 killers and the same 4 survivor perks. It's unbalanced, poorly programmed, the matchmaking is awful and consistently complained about features go years without being addressed because BHVR has an aggressive schedule to release new content. Content that is always, without fail, incomplete and full of bugs.

But we keep playing it because we are fools. Part of me thinks we only play to hurt each other. Whatever enjoyment we get out of this game is eclipsed by how inconsistent and aggravating it is. Steam has overwhelmingly positive reviews but even players with 1,000 hours hates this game. I seriously need a team of psychologists to crack this enigma. 

Crazy.

P.S. I've never run into so many fucking furries before.
find friends and enjoy the fun!
